snippet: It may be time to resume nonlethal aid to moderate rebels.
abstract: Editorial contends it may be time to resume nonlethal assistance to Syrian rebel groups, in order to strengthen Western-oriented opposition forces; warns against the growing power of Al Qaeda-affiliated groups like the Islamic State of Iraq and Syria; holds a negotiated political agreement remains the best solution, even though it does not seem likely.
lead_paragraph: It may be time to resume nonlethal aid to moderate rebels.
